_description: James Ryman, a song of thanksgiving — eight quatrains including refrain ‘Te deum laudamus’, and burden: ‘Nowe syng we thys tyme thus / Te deum laudamus’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O endles god of maiesteon in godhede in persons
                    thre…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…We kowlege the in euery costTe deum
                    laudamus

Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.

             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und

         89 (1892): 167-338: 303-4.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 205-6; 1977, 182.
